entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • View Transformations Not Applied on iOS #3600
  • Device.InvokeOnMainThreadAsync() throws when called from background thread #3597
  • DefaultLanguage property #3596
  • RowDefinition's and ColumnDefination's IsVisible #3595
  • Bring DefaultRenderer concept to .NET MAUI #3594
  • [Bug] [Android] ShellContentPage ContentPage.ToolbarItem not rendering #3593
  • [Bug] Custom font not working when used inside a custom library #3584

Closed

  • [Bug][Android] SearchHandlerAppearanceTracker throws a Null Reference exception #2923
  • BackgroundColor Animation not working on certain controls on Windows #3506
  • Border loses shape if stroke is 0 #3543
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Using Border throws with a shape of Rectangle #3349
  • Stepper ValueChanged is not called on Windows #3585

PullRequests

Created

  • Check for Element instead of VE on FindDispatcher #3599
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fixes AL Task error by not trying to embed default resources #3598

Merged

  • [AndroidX.targets] Bump to net6.0-android31.0 AndroidX packages. #2810
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update Essentials Screenshot API, capture native frames. #3529
    partner/ui-tools, area/essentials 🍞
  • Setup first set of Automation Properties #3222
    area/a11y, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Android] Fix crash using SearchHandler on Shell #3399
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows] Fix issues updating Background colors (animation) in some controls #3590
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟
  • [Android] Fix issue drawing a Border without define the border width #3587
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows] Fix issue not rendering Border if Background is null #3588
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3583
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Implement Stepper ValueChanged event #3589
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟

Updated

  • CarouselView android handler #3343
  • Introduce IVisualDiagnosticsOverlay #3351
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Core] make Microsoft.Maui.dll trimmable #3249
  • Button Padding #3575
    area/controls 🎮
  • [android] reduce JNI calls by moving logic into Java #3372
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Add IHighlightLayer #3205
  • Essentials: Port xamarin/Essentials#1760 #2763
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Implement CursorPosition in IEditor/ITextInput Handlers #3196
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Fix publishing WPF/WinForms Blazor apps with MSIX #3582
    area/blazor 🕸️, feature-blazor-windesktop, feature-blazor-sdk
